pageContext.claim: “North Korea, under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, will become a great Economic Powerhouse. He may surprise some but he won't surprise me, because I have gotten to know him & fully understand how capable he is. North Korea will become a different kind of Rocket - an Economic one!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has warmer praise for the brutal dictator of North Korea -- which imprisons thousands in forced-labor camps and practices some of the worst crimes against humanity on its people, according to the UN -- than he does for allied nations. This is also a questionable tweet because Trump routinely rails against socialism in Venezuela or in general.
